snippet.title: Drug bust at McDonald's drive-thru
snippet.content: TWO men have been busted with 5kg of ice at a McDonald's drive-thru in the central Queensland city of Rockhampton. Police nabbed the two men at the drive-through at 2.30am on Tuesday. The men has driven a Toyota Kluger through the drive-thru, on George St, where they were intercepted by police. A male driver and passenger were arrested at the scene. A 35-year-old Doolandella man and 37-year-old Eight Mile Plains man have been charged with drug related offences including possession of dangerous drugs, possess tainted property and contravene an order. The men have been charged and will appear in Rockhampton Magistrates Court on Wednesday.
